title: Calculus - position as a function of time

content.question: An object is moving along the <math alttext="x " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-axis, with position <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> given as a function of time <math alttext="t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> defined by the equation <math alttext="x of t equals 2 t cubed, minus 3 t squared, minus 8 t, minus 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> . Which of the following equations indicates how to determine the object's velocity <math alttext="v" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> as a function of <math alttext="t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="v of t equals the derivative with respect to t of, open parenthesis 2 t cubed, minus 3 t squared, minus 8 t, minus 3, close parenthesis, equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="v of t equals the derivative with respect to t of, open parenthesis 2 t cubed, minus 3 t squared, minus 8 t, minus 3, close parenthesis, equals 0"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="v of t equals the integral with respect to x of, open parenthesis, 2 t cubed, minus 3 t squared, minus 8 t, minus 3, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="v of t equals the integral with respect to t of, open parenthesis, 2 t cubed, minus 3 t squared, minus 8 t, minus 3, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="v of t equals the fraction, open parenthesis, 2 t cubed, minus 3 t squared, minus 8 t, minus 3, close parenthesis, over t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="v of t equals the derivative with respect to t of, open parenthesis 2 t cubed, minus 3 t squared, minus 8 t, minus 3, close parenthesis, equals 0"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
